title: MBMA Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 28 Apprentice Posts
description: The Meghalaya Basin Management Agency (MBMA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 28 Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the MBMA Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how...
